title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Douglas DC-3 - using the gyropilot
description:
In this video we will have a look at how to use the gyropilot in the Douglas DC-3. The gyropilot is a predecessor of the autopilot which we know from modern aircrafts and allow you to let the aircraft be controlled without having you to make continuous changes to the altitude and direct by using the yoke.
